verbose_text: During exercise, sodium bicarbonate has been shown to result in higher lactate levels during exercise despite a similar intramuscular pH [XREF_BIBR] and promotes greater glycogen and phosphocreatine utilization [XREF_BIBR], suggesting increased capacity for anaerobic energy production.
